description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files and much more.
releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes
NETWORKNET-33347 - Special char "ì" is converted to square when EML is converted to Mhtml
NETWORKNET-33353 - Priority not displayed while saving an Eml message into a Mhtml file
NETWORKNET-33360 - Property Fields of the extracted message get changed
NETWORKNET-33365 - How to set container class for any PST folder
NETWORKNET-33367 - How to get the Email Address of current MailBox using ExchangeWebServiceClient?
NETWORKNET-33371 - Setting the Time Zone on Appointments
NETWORKNET-33374 - EML files Hanging MailMessage.Load
NETWORKNET-33379 - Error "Object Reference not set to an instance of object" while loading EML
NETWORKNET-33380 - Aspose.Email for .NET - Attachment File Name Corruption (#42009)
NETWORKNET-33381 - Email Property gets merged when extracted from PST
NETWORKNET-33382 - Some text in the start of an EML extracted from MBOXRD
NETWORKNET-33383 - MapiCalendar.save fails to save recurring events on Calendar
NETWORKNET-33384 - System.InvalidCastException on trying to extract Calendar items from a PST
 
Enhancements
NETWORKNET-33235 - Avoid expired/bad server certificate while using Aspose.Email.Mail.SmtpClient
 
New Features
NETWORKNET-33324 - Set follow up flag and due date for a message
NETWORKNET-33346 - Add Contacts to Exchange
NETWORKNET-33368 - Log Activity for Aspose.Email.Mail.SmtpClient
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
